About Me

BIO

I am Web Developer in a variety of technologies, and I have experience working with both the front and back end of modern web applications. Some of the languages, frameworks and libraries I have experience with are:

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • jQuery
  • AngularJS
  • Angular 2+
  • ASP.NET
  • C#
  • NodeJS
  • ExpressJS
  • SQL
  • MySQL
  • PostGres
  • MongoDB
  • RabbitMQ
  • OOP
  • MVC
  • Entity Framework
  • NHibernate
  • LLBLGen

MTM Recognition

Software Developer II

Work with a team of developers on a large catalog of over 80 software applications developed over years using technologies ranging from Web Forms with a SQL database to modern NodeJS and a MongoDB database, and a wide range in between. This primarily was development on existing platforms adding features and expanding on existing functionality, but occasionally new development was needed.

Roundcore Technologies

Contract Software Developer

Work on this projected involved all portions of the technology stack including front end design implementation of mock-ups for different clients all using the same portion of the system, as well as database and table creation and modification, and extensive query and report work on this data to provide as needed to the client.

Park Energy Services

Software Developer

Using the full JavaScript technology stack write new features and functionality as directed by the executive management team as well as fix any bugs discovered in the system. The field personnel using this system had to be able to work offline due to internet service coverage issues in remote areas, and then to be able to sync data back to the server when back online. This also included a quarterly inventory everyone did at the same time, which had to be correct and timely for budgetary and performance reporting requirements.
